name: ARSessionDelegate
desc: Methods you can implement to receive captured video frame images and tracking state from an AR session.

items.name: func session(ARSession, didUpdate: ARFrame)
items.desc: Provides a newly captured camera image and accompanying AR information to the delegate.

items.name: func session(ARSession, didAdd: [ARAnchor])
items.desc: Tells the delegate that one or more anchors have been added to the session.

items.name: func session(ARSession, didUpdate: [ARAnchor])
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the session has adjusted the properties of one or more anchors.

items.name: func session(ARSession, didRemove: [ARAnchor])
items.desc: Tells the delegate that one or more anchors have been removed from the session.
